meanings.definition: The action or process of causing so much damage to something that it no longer exists or cannot be repaired.
meanings.sent1: The destruction of the old building was loud and scary.
meanings.sent2: The hurricane left a path of destruction in its wake.
meanings.sent3: The little boy's destruction of his sandcastle made his sister laugh.
meanings.sent4: The destruction of trust can be as devastating as a natural disaster.
meanings.sent5: The destruction caused by the fire was heartbreaking to witness.

meanings.sent1: The city lay in ruins, a picture of destruction.
meanings.sent2: The soldier returned to a scene of utter destruction.
meanings.sent3: The destruction of the cake was a delicious sight.
meanings.sent4: The destruction of their friendship was like a sudden storm.
meanings.sent5: The destruction of the forest left a haunting emptiness.
